description: Forest Foods is an innovative agricultural initiative based in Limuru, Kenya, focused on sustainable farming practices. Founded by a diverse team, the project aims to disrupt traditional agricultural systems by implementing advanced agroforestry techniques. With a commitment to enhancing food production, restoring ecosystems, and promoting transparency in the food supply chain, Forest Foods seeks to empower local farmers and create a model for sustainable agriculture that can be replicated across the region.
name: Forest Foods
